snippet.title: ConflictCraft - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Defend and attack at same time. In this strategy game you need to capture as many bases as you can. 
Different type of bases - anti-air guns, turrets, radio tower to call for backup, nuclear silos. 

3 different type of units - tanks, apaches and dropships - will be at your disposal. 
Some strategic points will provide with global weapons - napalm and nuclear power. 

More then 20 missions for campaign, co-op mode, full support for controllers. 

Current state of development: 
- Currently 15 maps are ready and playable, 
- 5 different types of strategic points, 
- editor to make own levels, 
- co-op via controllers and keyboard, 
- global weapons - nuclear missiles and napalm.
